get.summary: Returns metadata regarding all available maps.
get.description: Returns metadata regarding all available maps, the primary purpose of this call is to list available maps and their core metadata. This method is primarily an aggregation of ```/v1/map/{map}/metadata``` for each map. The version number returned is the version of the schema for this result and can usually be ignored. The start property contains the default recommended starting position of any rendered map. This is overridden by each map.

maps.description: A collection of Map Metadata objects which are an aggregation of ```/v1/map/{map}/metadata``` being called for each map.

get.summary: Returns metadata for a specific map
get.description: Returns metadata for a specific map. See the id property of MapMetadata for what should be passed as the path parameter {map}.

get.summary: Returns the latest date for which there is data for the specified map.
get.description: Returns the latest date for which there is data for the specified map. For archived map data this will be a fixed date (i.e. the last_date field in MapMetadata), otherwise, it's the last time data was processed.

get.summary: Returns the regions for a given region type and map.
get.description: Returns the regions for a given region type and map as an array of identifiers.

get.summary: Returns all the region and region type combinations for a given map.
get.description: Returns all the region and region type combinations for a given map.

get.summary: Returns the GeoJSON for the region on a map
get.description: Returns the GeoJSON for the region on a map.

post.summary: Returns related Tweets for the specified regions.
post.description: Returns related Tweets for the specified regions.

post.summary: Returns related Tweets for the specified regions.
post.description: Returns related Tweets for the specified regions.

post.summary: Returns the number of messages, i.e. tweets, since a specific time.
post.description: Returns the number of messages, i.e. tweets, since a specific time. This is provided so that recently active regions can be flagged.

post.summary: Returns data for a time series graph.
post.description: Returns data for a time series graph.

regionType.description: The type of the regions specified by the regions property

regions.description: A set of regions to retrieve texts for. These regions must be of the type specified by the property regionType.

page.description: For paged results, the page to return. This means results will be from pageSize * page to pageSize * (page+1) - 1 .

pageSize.description: For paged results, the number of results per page.

textSearch.description: Additional BOOLEAN (MySQL) query string matched against the text of each message.

timePeriod.description: Aggregate over either day or hour.

StatsResponseItem.description: The statistics for a given region.

region.description: The region the statistics are for.

count.description: The number of messages counted for this region.

exceedance.description: The exceedance value for the region as a percentage. Lower is more unusual, higher is more usual.

json.description: The full JSON object supplied by the source service, i.e. Twitter

source.description: The originating service, e.g. Twitter, for the message

id.description: The identifier given by the source service, i.e. Twitter, for the message

location.description: A GeoJSON object representing the location of the message.

region_type.description: The region type of the region this message belongs to

region.description: The region this message relates to.

hazard.description: The hazard this message relates to.

possibly_sensitive.description: TRUE if the message may contain inappropriate text or images.

warning.description: TRUE if the message comes from an automated warning.

additional_media_info.title: Storm Franklin: Rotherham Station floods as River Don bursts banks

extended_tweet.full_text:
Rotherham Station is flooded after the River Don burst its banks.

Train services in parts of Yorkshire have been cancelled as Storm Franklin brings even more bad weather to England.

Latest on #StormFranklin: https://t.co/A4Vv4kS26F https://t.co/srWuwPMIlj

TimeSeriesResponseItem.description: Stats for a given day/hour window per region

region.description: The region the statistics are for.

date.description: UTC date string for the data.

count.description: The number of messages counted for this region.

exceedance.description: The exceedance value for the region as a percentage. Lower is more unusual, higher is more usual.

title.description: A human-readable string describing the region

level.description: The aggregation level of the region.
